Subject: RE: meeting with 
Date: Tue, 08 Jun 2021 19:09:15 +0000 
Attachments: 
Wamingfor_Employeeffoltmtary_Inteniew_Form).docx; 
Kalkines_Warning_(Compelled_Interview_Form).docx 
Good afternoon and 
I hope this email finds you well. I have attached the draft interview questions for for your review. This is still a  draft 
and will certainly be edited prior to the interview. However, I wanted to give you both enough time to review the 
questions so that you were able to make any edits and/or suggestions that you feel appropriate prior to the interview. I 
only ask that you make your edits in track changes so that I am clear on what it is you have changed. I have also attached 
the forms which we, as Dal OIG agents, are required to provide to all employees at the start of their Subject interview. 
Per our conversation, it is my understanding that we will be utilizing the Voluntary Interview Form, but I also wanted to 
provide you with the Compelled Interview Form, in case you wanted to compare the two to be certain we are all of the 
same understanding. Finally, we received guidance that we are required to record the interviews, so please let me know if 
you know (or believe) this to be a problem so that we may address the issue prior to the interview(s). 
Thanks very much in advance. I hope you're both having a nice day. 
SSA 
U.S. Department of Justice 
OIG Boston Area Office 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, June 8, 2021 9:08 AM 
To: 
(OIG) 
> 
Cc: (USANYS) <> 
Subject: FW: meeting with 
. (OIG) 
See below. Does this work for you? We are still waiting on a update from _counsel, whom we spoke to last week. I 
will let you know what we hear. 
From: Montell Figgins, Esq. 
Sent: Monday, June 7, 20219:53 AM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: meeting with 
Mr. is available on June 17, 2021.
